text: Tyun, Tyown, or Tiwn (majuscule: Տ; minuscule: տ; Armenian: տյուն; Classical Armenian: տիւմ) is the thirty-first letter of the Armenian alphabet. It has a numerical value of 4000.https://bararanonline.com/%D5%BF-%D5%BF%D5%A1%D5%BC%D5%A8 ==See also== * Armenian alphabet * Mesrop Mashtots ==References== ==External links== * Տ on Wiktionary * տ on Wiktionary Category:Armenian alphabet
title: Tyun (letter)
